sentences: Põhjuseks on see, et ta oli haige.
See oli peamine põhjuseks meie edukaks.
context: The Estonian word 'põhjuseks' is part of the instrumental case form of 'põhjus', meaning 'reason'. It functions as a prepositional phrase indicating cause or reason, similar to English phrases like 'as the reason' or 'because of'. This form is used when explaining why something happened or exists.
